attributes.action: Allow disabled bus pass use at any time, not just after the morning rush hour
attributes.additional_details: The government wants to get more people back to work but we're unable to use our disabled bus pass to get there. Lots of disabled people are able to work some jobs but most work places need you to start at 9am. Not allowing use of the bus pass on a morning is putting an extra barrier in place where most people have no other option of travel like walking/cycling to a workplace.
attributes.background: Stop the ban on disabled bus pass use before 9/9:30am

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Change England’s disabled bus pass so it can be used at any time on weekdays 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729326
